question: Which of these Roman emperors was titled Restorer of the World?
description: This title was given to Aurelian after he reintegrated separatist states of Palmerine and Gallic Empires in 273 and 274 respectively.

question: Battle of Catalunyan Plains is seen as Rome's last great victory. Who commanded Roman forces?
description: Battle of Catalunyan Plains took place in 451 C.E between Huns led by Attila and Romano-German coallition led by Flavius Aetius and king Theodoric I.

question: Which city was the capital of western part of Roman Empire in years 420-476 C.E.?
description: Ravenna was seat of the western Emperor since it replaced Milan in 401 C.E., untill Odoacerr deposed emperor Romulus Augustulus.

question: Which of these battles did end with Roman victory?
description: Battle of Idistaviso took place in 16 C.E. Roman army led by Germanicus defeated germanic confederation of Arminius, archieving Roman goal of avenging defeat in Teutoborg Forest.
